snippet.title: A Game Where You Swing Your Own Weapon
snippet.description:
Beyond by Awasete - Early Gameplay Trailer 1
Download Game: https://awasete.itch.io/beyond 
Music by AZALI: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9UKPs9ZisfhMJdalnETLRg

Beyond is a difficult, action-driven, linear sidescroller with unique combat mechanics. Each level is tied together by an overarching narrative element and progression accumulates in the form of equipment gathered after each completed level. The game is set in an ethereal world filled with magical beasts, and warriors. and weapons. The player begins as a Shinigami who needs to collect souls from the inhabitants of said world. Along their quest, they will face off against others with the very same goal.
